title: How to create a Custom Skin for League of Legends #44

embed.description: Hello everyone, this is my guide on how to easily make a custom skin for any league of legends champions. And here are the websites you'll need to know that I'll be talking about during the guide. Theres a bit in it where theres a black screen while I talk for a minute, sorry about that, I couldn't avoid it =P.

body:
Hello everyone, it seems complicated but its really easy, so this is my guide of how to make a custom skins for league of legends champs for yourself, enjoy =)

SentienceLOL

[http://www.youtube.com/SentienceLOL ]

replies.body: Thank you so much for this post! I used to use Yurixys skins years ago and have missed them a lot! Will be good to have them back again :D
A friend asked me how to make skins and I couldn't tell him fast enough without going right into it, so I thought I'd make a video, thx for the support =)
